tool_description: Get insight into who the richest people in the world 2023 are. Here you will find detailed information about over 2500 billionaires. You can search and filter by many aspects such as age or country.
name: Billionaires
title: Billionaires

api_list.name: Billionaire details
api_list.description: Here ypu can find really detailed information about a specific billionair

api_list.name: Advanced search
api_list.description: Here you can do an advanced search in our database by setting filters like age or country

api_list.name: All Billionaires
api_list.description: Here you can get basic information about all billionairs in our database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://billionaires1.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "billionaires1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://billionaires1.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "billionaires1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
